root.name: TI Invaders
root.description: TI invaders is a Space Invaders clone for the Texas Instruments 99/4A. Like Space Invaders, the goal is to clear the screen of all the alien sprites using your laser. The aliens move progressively lower and the cover that the player can use is destructible. As more aliens are destroyed, the remaining aliens increase their speed making the game more challenging.
